whoAreUs.title: Who are we?
whoAreUs.text: Rolestadan Real Estate Company is one of the branches of the Rolista company specialized in the field of legal advice and services of various types of real estate and technology in addition to the car trade and internal and external shipping

ourService.title: Our services
ourService.text: We provide you with a set of distinguished services provided by the best experts in the field of real estate consultancy and the field of cars of various kinds

Consultservice.title: Free consultations
Consultservice.text: Free consultations throughout the week provided by a group of experts and specialists, all you have to do is contact us and know all you need

lawservice.title: Legal follow-up
lawservice.text: Follow-up of all legal matters related to real estate and vehicles, including transfer of ownership, rent, real estate inspection and regulation matters

citizinService.title: Investment and citizenship
citizinService.text: We provide you with distinctive and varied real estate options through which Turkish citizenship can be obtained and at the same time excellent investment opportunity

airportService.title: From the airport to the property
airportService.text: We provide you with our tourism and real estate services at the same time as we receive you from the airport gate and accompany you in the tourist city of Mersin to find the right property for you.

footer.desc: One of the branches of the service company Rolista specializing in legal advice, real estate services and vehicles
footer.address: Çiftlikköy, İsmet İnönü Blv. No:690/19, 33160 Yenişehir/Mersin
